channel.title: Making it so admins lose stuff when they die?
channel.description:
Im using jinrake source (the one with antileech) and when a admin dies they dont give pvp or lose items like a normal player!
I tried checking client.java but i couldnt find anything i could understand that would do that... please help me :(, is there another .java file i should be looking in for this?

well tryin goin into dropeditem.cfg i think and see if its in there or some server got a command called ::emptyall (username
